utils module

class utils.Converter

Bases: object

Converter class to convert a list of dictionary objects to various formats

static convert_to_csv(list_of_dicts, field_names, path)

Converts list of dictionary objects to csv

Parameters

  • list_of_dicts – list containing dictionary objects

  • field_names – list of names of the fields

  • path – output path of the generated csv

static convert_to_excel(list_of_dicts, path)

Converts list of dictionary objects to excel

Parameters

  • list_of_dicts – list containing dictionary objects

  • path – output path of the generated excel

static convert_to_html(list_of_dicts, path)

Converts list of dictionary objects to html

Parameters

  • list_of_dicts – list containing dictionary objects

  • path – output path of the generated html

static convert_to_pdf(list_of_dicts, path)

Converts list of dictionary objects to pdf

Parameters

  • list_of_dicts – list containing dictionary objects

  • path – output path of the generated pdf

static convert_to_xml(list_of_dicts, path)

Converts list of dictionary objects to xml

Parameters

  • list_of_dicts – list containing dictionary objects

  • path – output path of the generated xml

utils.flatten(obj, keys)

flattens the dictionary object specified in the argument

Parameters

  • obj – object to be flattened

  • keys – list of keys which are not flattened by default

Returns

reference of flattened object

utils.setup_logger(module_name, log_file, log_format=<logging.Formatter object>, level=20)

for setting up multiple loggers easily

Parameters

  • module_name – name of the module to generate logs for

  • log_file – path of the file to generate the logs

  • log_format – format of the log

  • level – log level

Returns
